customizedCssClass.description: Css class name to use to customize a specific powerbar's style.

keysToColors.description: List of [key, color] couples that associates a hex color to each key

items.description: Key to which a color is associated
Hex color associated to the key

colorsSaturationWeight.description: Knowing that saturation scale is [0, 1], `colorsSaturationWeight` is a factor (between 0 and 1) that tightens this scale to [(1-colorsSaturationWeight), 1]. Therefore all generated colors saturation will be within this scale.

diameter.description: Diameter of the donut. If it's not set, the donut take the Max(width,height) of the div containing the svg.

unit.description: Unit of a node in the donut
